bibl.note: Detailed data versus the specificity of Egypt. - A plurality of customs duties: Imperial customs dues at zone frontiers; - Internal and Alexandrian customs duties; - Customs rates and exemptions; - Customs house registers and receipts; - The road toll. - Tax collectors: local and supraregional tax farmers. - Tax collectors of imperial customs dues at provincial or zone frontiers. - Tax collectors of internal provincial customs levies. - Tax payers: transporters and transport firms in the service of local traders and prominent businessmen. - Conclusion.
